alert.note: Alert for Jones; Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 10:59AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Houston, Jones, Monroe, Twiggs and Bibb Counties. Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville affecting Bleckley and Pulaski Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at GA 18 at Dames Ferry affecting Jones and Monroe Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at GA 18 at Dames Ferry. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17 feet, Minor flooding expands into woodlands upstream and downstream from the gage on Dames Ferry Road or Georgia Highway 18. Low lying areas and portions of river access roads will become inundated with water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 17.3 feet and falling. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM EDT Tuesday was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 16 feet. - . - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
